title: Brighten Up Your Winter Wardrobe With These Colorful Tights
description: A simple change can make all the difference.
excerpt: From heritage Italian hosiery, silky lilac tights, and subtle tones of forest green, these colorful tights will brighten any look.

html:
Best Cherry Red Tights

Stems Avery Microfiber Tights

Cherry red tights have been trending, and they happen to look great under little black dresses as much as they pair beautifully with other scarlet pieces.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Red

Material: Polyamide, elastane, cotton

Luxe Tights

Falke Sensual Cashmere 50 Denier Tights

Falke makes some of the most luxurious tights out there, and this plum pair would look great in lieu of a black tight.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Black, White, Plum

Material: Cotton, polyamide, cashmere, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bright Blue Tights

Falke Pure Matte 50 Tights

Hear us out, bright blue tights could replace the navy pair you already love. Just consider them a more vibrant and playful side of the shade!

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Imperial, Scarlet, Marine, Cinamon

Material: Polymide, elastane

Pink Lace

Self-Portrait Lace Tights

Looking to ease into colorful tights? A delicate baby pink lace design offers just the right amount of color with an eye-catching design that feels subtle yet beautifully vibrant.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Pink

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Italian Heritage

Oroblu All Colors 50-Denier Tights

Italian brand Oroblu was founded in 1973 and is renowned for its craftsmanship in hosiery, so you know they’ll feel fantastic on—and last way longer than your other pairs.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Marine, Mustard

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Silky Pair

Lechery Lustrous Silky Shiny 20 Denier Tights

One way to boost your mood (and give your outfit recipe a refresh) is by wearing a distinctly springy mint green with your go-to winter coat. With that in mind, elevate your everyday outfits with these tights, which will add a silky touch to your ensemble.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Greyed Olive, Black, Grey, Brown, Red

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Slightly Shiny

Lechery Shiny 20 Denier Tights

Want something that feels extra special? A pair of tights with a sheen feels dressier than your usual opaque pair, and this plum color would look striking against a leather mini skirt.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: 8 options

Material: Nylon, Spandex

Tummy Control

Sheertex Control Top Sheer Rip-Resist Tights

Sheertex is renowned for its virtually indestructible tights, and they also offer built-in tummy control, making them the perfect choice for a pair that combines durability with the benefits of traditional shapewear.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: 7 options

Material: Patent pending polymers

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pretty in Pink

Falke Pure Matt 50 DEN Tights

Barbie-inspired pink and magenta aren’t going anywhere. Mix up an all-red ensemble for a sweet twist on the color combination that feels just as polished as it is playful.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: 22 options

Material: Recycled polyamide, elastane

The Splurge Worthy Pair

Valentino Floral Lace Tights

Want to dazzle in a set of statement tights? They might be on the pricier side, but this floral lilac pair from Valentino makes hosiery feel extra special and like something to be coveted.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Floral

Material:: Polyester, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pink Stripes

Stems Anemone Sheer Floral Striped Tights

If you don’t want to commit to a full pink pair of tights, this pair has small stripes of pink (some of which are even floral) that offer just a touch of your favorite rosy hue.

Sizes: One size

Colors: Chrysanthemum

Material: Nylon, polyamide

Subtle Green Opaque

Artitzia Everyday Opaque Tights

For the days when you want a hint of color but want to keep things slightly more subtle, these forest green tights make the perfect addition to any outfit.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Scarab, Sugarplum Lilac, Red, Black

Material: Nylon, Elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Polka Dot with a Twist

Calzedonia Sheer polka dot tights

Polka dot tights are a classic, and this pair—which comes in a cheer burgundy—feels like an updated take on a traditional style.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Pois Vinaccia, Blue Dot, Nude Dot

Material: Polyamide, Elastane, Cotton

Biggest Color Range

Frola 80 Denier Soft Semi Opaque Solid Color Tights

No matter what color you’re hyper-fixated on, chances are it’s on Amazon—and yes, that includes this gorgeous lilac hue.

Sizes: S-2X

Colors: 31 options

Material: Polyamide, elastane, cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Opaque Navy

CozyWow 80D Soft Solid Color Semi Opaque

The reason opaque tights are so popular is that they basically give you extra coverage and are significantly warmer than their sheer counterparts. You’ll want to stock up on these.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Colors: 27 options

Material: Nylon, spandex

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
